EWC $150 SC $75 (HAVE TO BE PULLED IN AND CLEANED) EC $150 GEN CLEANING $25 OF ALUMINUM ENDS CAPS ON NORTH SIDE (IF NEEDED) WOULD NEED WATERFED FOR THIS
When going in to take out screens make sure very careful and clean, cleaning lady was just in
JOB NOT DONE, CUSTOMER ASKED TO RESCHEDULE

HOWARD CALLED IN THE MORNING ASKING FOR PERIODIC CALLS THROUGHOUT THE DAY TO UPDATE HIM ON WHEN WE'D BE ARRIVING, TEAM IN THE FIELD DID NOT GET THAT MEMO. TEAM CALLED AROUND 3PM TO INFORM HIM OF OUR ARRIVAL PAST 4PM, THEN AGAIN WE CALLED AT 5PM TO LET HIM KNOW WE WERE ON OUR WAY. HE SAID HE HAD ALREADY CALLED HEAD OFFICE TO RESCHEDULE THE CLEANING FOR ANOTHER TIME CAUSE IT WAS TOO LATE IN THE DAY. HE SAID HE WAS IRRITATED WITH THE  LACK OF COMMUNICATION THROUGHOUT THE DAY.
NOTE FOR NEXT TIME: CALL THROUGHOUT THE DAY TO UPDATE ETA, UNLESS ITS THE FIRST JOB OF THE DAY. AND HEAD OFFICE CONFIRMED WE GIVING HIM %15 OFF NEXT CLEAN AS A COURTESY.
